history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Hello.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Lawrenceville
TTS Okay, going to lawrenceville. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER Damn that station.
TTS Okay, going to lawrenceville. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Edgewood
TTS Okay, leaving from edgewood. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER noon
TTS Okay, travelling at 07:13 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 40 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 12 mins to East Busway at Hamnett Station C. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the P1 to East Busway at Negley Station C. It will depart at 7:28pm. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 2 mins to Negley avenue at East Busway Steps. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the 64 to Penn avenue at 40th St. It will depart at 7:41pm. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 4 mins to Lawrenceville, Pittsburgh, PA 15201, USA. </speak>
